ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hodseq.2 | |- S : ~H --> ~H |
| 2 |  | hodseq.3 | |- T : ~H --> ~H |
| 3 |  | #P_ho0f | |- 0hop : ~H --> ~H |
| 4 | 3, 2 | #P_hosubcli | |- ( 0hop -op T ) : ~H --> ~H |
| 5 | 2, 1, 4 | #P_hoadd12i | |- ( T +op ( S +op ( 0hop -op T ) ) ) = ( S +op ( T +op ( 0hop -op T ) ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 3 | #P_hodseqi | |- ( T +op ( 0hop -op T ) ) = 0hop |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( S +op ( T +op ( 0hop -op T ) ) ) = ( S +op 0hop ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_hoaddid1i | |- ( S +op 0hop ) = S |
| 9 | 5, 7, 8 | #P_3eqtri | |- ( T +op ( S +op ( 0hop -op T ) ) ) = S |
| 10 | 1, 4 | #P_hoaddcli | |- ( S +op ( 0hop -op T ) ) : ~H --> ~H |
| 11 | 1, 2, 10 | #P_hodsi | |- ( ( S -op T ) = ( S +op ( 0hop -op T ) ) <-> ( T +op ( S +op ( 0hop -op T ) ) ) = S ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_mpbir | |- ( S -op T ) = ( S +op ( 0hop -op T ) ) |
